He has been working in this business for three years and it is going very well. In this circumstance, Edisson needs the loan to do maintenance on the used cars, like buying tires, pistons and other things.  

Edisson is a member of the communal bank “Unión Latina”; he does well in the group because he is a responsible and punctual person.

loans.use: to buy tires, pistons and other things.

loans.name: Maura

texts.en:
Maura is 34 years old and from Dampas District, Tagbilaran City. She is married and has four children. Her eldest is 13 and her youngest is 4. 

Maura is currently engaged in a sari-sari store (variety store) business to help support her family. She is asking for a loan to buy additional stock, like noodles, soft drinks, and snack foods. Maura's income goes towards her children's healthy diet and reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock, like noodles, soft drinks, and snack foods.

loans.name: Catherine Carmen

texts.es:
La socia Catherine nació en el departamento de Arequipa pero desde el año 2009 que vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 37 años de edad y es casada pero aun no tiene hijos. Su actividad económica principal de la socia Catherine enseñar música, ella tiene un pequeño taller de música donde enseña instrumentos como por ejemplo  violín, guitarra, flauta entre otros instrumentos. En esta oportunidad la socia Catherine requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del taller de música pues desea comprar pintura y brochas.  

La socia Catherine pertenece al banco comunal “Unión Latina” y le va muy bien pues una persona responsable y puntual.
texts.en: Catherine was born in Arequipa Department but has lived in the beautiful city of Cusco since 2009.  She’s 37-years-old, married but has no children yet.  Her main economic activity is teaching music.  She has a small music studio where she teaches instruments like violin, guitar and flute, among other instruments.  On this occasion, Catherine needs the loan to provide maintenance to her music studio; she wants to buy paint and brushes.  Catherine is a member of the “Unión Latina” (Latin Unity) communal bank and does very well because she’s a responsible, punctual person.

loans.use: to buy paint and brushes.

loans.name: Odiljon

texts.en: Odiljon is a very clever men. He is very hardworking and always works hard from early morning till late evening. For more than 14 years, he has been busy growing cotton, corn, and vegetables. He likes his work and works with pleasure. His harvest is high quality. He sells his harvest in the local amrket. He has many customers and all of them are glad for his work. He has a large family. His wife and 5 children help him with business. Odiljon is planning to grow carrots as well. He is asking for a loan to buy seeds for the new planting. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy seeds for the new season.

loans.name: Haitham

texts.en: Haitham is a 40-year-old married man from Lebanon. He is living with his wife and two children who are still attending school. He has worked as a taxi driver since 2005, transporting customers to their desired locations. In parallel, he has worked on a freelance basis as a car blacksmith for many years. To afford the high costs of living and meet his family's needs, Haitham is obliged to work multiple jobs. He stated that his income is barely enough, so today, he is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform the needed maintenance on his car in order to make his taxi service easier and safer. He will also repaint the car and repair its exterior to attract more customers and gain higher income. In the future, he plans to replace his car with a new one.

loans.use: to perform the needed maintenance on his car.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
El socio Luis Alberto nació en el departamento del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 46 años de edad,  es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal del socio Luis Alberto es la venta de medicina alternativa o natural. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad el socio Luis Alberto requiere el préstamo para comprar herramientas, materiales de trabajo, productos naturales, plantas, hierbas  y otras cosas más. 

El socio Luis Alberto pertenece al banco comunal “Unión Latina” y le va muy bien pues una persona responsable y puntual.
texts.en: Luis Alberto was born in Cusco Department and still lives in the city of his birth.  He’s 46-years-old, married and has two children.  His main economic activity is selling alternative or natural remedies.  He’s been in this business for several years now and does very well.  On this occasion, Luis Alberto needs the loan to buy tools, work supplies, natural products, plants, herbs and other things.  Luis Alberto belongs to the “Unión Latina” (Latin Unity) communal bank and does very well because he’s a responsible, punctual person.

loans.use: to buy tools, work supplies, natural products, plants, herbs and others.

loans.name: Los Girasoles De Compone Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS GIRASOLES DE COMPONE”; Este banco se ubica en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Virginia; ella es conviviente y tiene 42 años y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos en las ferias de los días viernes, la socia a la vez se dedica a la compra y venta de leche la socia trabaja de forma ambulatoria repartiendo la leche a sus clientes, la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar leche para su negocio.

Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de ganados, venta de leche, crianza de animales menores, ganaderia, venta de productos lácteos.

Las socias que salen adjuntas en la foto son socias que pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Virginia belongs to the “Los Girasoles de Compone” (Compone Sunflowers) located in Anta District belonging to Anta Province and Cusco Department.  She’s 42-years-old, has a spouse and six children.  She alternates her daily activities with raising small farm animals like guinea pigs.  She raises these little animals to then sell them at the Friday street market.  She also buys and sells milk.  She works from place to place distributing milk to her customers.  She’s a cheerful, responsible person who very much wants to continue working for her family.  She’s asking for the loan to buy milk for her business.

The other group members sell cattle, sell milk, raise small farm animals and cattle and sell dairy products.

The members appearing in the inserted photos had asked permission to be late for the meeting.

Virginia thanks all those who share in her dream through this means and commits to make her installment payments according to the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: Armen

texts.en: Armen is a 29-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and one sibling. He has owned a car repair shop since 2005 and has 10 years of experience working in the same occupation. He works very hard in collaboration with his father to support the family. Recently, he hired a part-time employee to help him complete the work. Today, he is requesting a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase car spare parts at good prices. He notes that these purchases will allow him to provide better services to his customers. In the future, he plans to expand his business into other areas. He is optimistic about his business development and hopes that the coming years will bring positive growth.

loans.use: to purchase car spare parts at good prices.

loans.name: Duncan

texts.en:
Duncan is applying for his second loan cycle from KADET LTD. after repaying the previous loan successfully. 

Duncan will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm. With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his siblings. His hopes and dreams are to buy a big piece of land and practice largescale farming.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Sarita Raquel

texts.es:
Sarita es una joven de 18 de años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres y su pequeño hijo de 2 años de edad, ella es una joven muy alegre, entusiasta y trabajadora, que tiene un gran deseo de superación y muchos deseos de sacar adelante a su pequeño; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo cursar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de contabilidad, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos junto  a su pequeño y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y gracias al apoyo de su hermana mayor, Sarita puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa para niños y calzado para jóvenes, ella dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y se siente a gusto realizando su labor, ya que cree que le va bien porque cuenta con buenos clientes.
Sarita se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de instalación e implementación de su local arrendado en el centro de su ciudad; de esta manera Sarita contará con su negocio adecuadamente acondicionado para realizar su labor, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales desea utilizar para poder adquirir un local propio y en un futuro no muy lejano su casa propia y así espera poder asegurar la educación y futuro de su pequeño.
texts.en:
Sarita is an 18-year-old youth. She lives in the city of Nazca with her parents and her small 2-year-old son. She is a very happy, enthusiastic and hardworking youth who has a lot of desire to overcome and many wishes to get her little one ahead. Unfortunately, due to the necessity to work and cover her expenses, she was not able to get a professional degree. However, she would have liked to study accounting. In her free time, she likes to watch educational programs with her little one and occasionally cook a delicious rice with duck dish to share with her family. 
With much determination, enthusiasm and thanks to the support of her older sister, Sarita started a small business selling children’s clothes and shoes for young people. She works at her business approximately 10 hours per day and she feels good working, since she believes that it is going well for her because she has good customers. 
Sarita is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the support provided, she can cover the expenses of setting up and stocking her rented local in the center of the city. In this way, Sarita will have her business equipped, in order to carry out her work. With this, she hopes to increase her sales and increase her financial income, which she wants in order to acquire her own local and in the not long off future her own house and in this way she hopes to be able to assure the education and future of her little one.

loans.use: to set up and stock her store.

loans.name: Lyiza

texts.ru: Луиза женщина в возрасте 37 лет, замужем, имеет 1 дочь. Торгует различными тканями для пошива женской одежды на рынке более 5 лет. Кредитуется в нашей организации с 2010 года и ни разу не нарушала условия кредитования. Этот кредит Луизы - 3 по счету. У неё начался летний сезон продаж тканей, и торговля идет хорошо. Поэтому она планирует на полученный кредит привезти широкий ассортимент летних тканей. Муж Луизы является работником государственной службы. Он всячески поддерживает Луизу, помогая вести хозяйство и воспитывать дочь. Луиза с мужем благодарны нашей организации за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Lyiza is a 37 year-old woman, who is married and has one daughter.  She has been selling various fabrics for sewing women's clothing at a market for over five years.  She has been obtaining financing from our organization since 2010 and has never violated our terms and conditions.  This is Lyiza's third loan.  The summer fabric season has started, and her sales are going well.  This is why she plans to use this loan to bring in a wide assortment of summer fabrics.  Lyiza's husband is a municipal service worker.  He supports Lyiza in many ways by helping her run the household and raise their daughter.  Lyiza and her husband are grateful to our organization for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy seasonal summer fabrics

loans.name: Jorge Arnaldo

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 43 años, muy trabajador y entusiasta, dedicado por completo a su familia, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, con su amada esposa y sus 2 queridos hijos, con quienes en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol y en algunas ocasiones prepara un riquísimo Pollo al Horno para compartir un delicioso almuerzo con su familia.  
Por iniciativa propia y gracias al apoyo de su esposa, Jorge trabaja en el rubro de la construcción, él se desempeña como maestro constructor, puede trabajar aproximadamente 12 horas diarias, gracias a su talento y habilidades para la construcción Jorge cuenta con buenos clientes, él puede atender hasta 5 clientes mensualmente, quienes siempre lo solicitan para realizar trabajos de construcción. 
Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de madera para ser utilizada como material en las construcciones que realice, así también podrá comprar herramientas, tales como: martillos, cubos, paletas, entre otros; de esta manera Jorge podrá incrementar sus ingresos económicos y con ello generará mayor bienestar para su familia, asegurando la educación de sus hijos, ya que su gran sueño es ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Jorge, 43, is very hardworking, enthusiastic and totally devoted to his family.  He lives in the city of Nazca with his beloved wife and two beloved children he enjoys playing soccer with in his free time and sometimes prepares a delicious “Pollo al Horno” to share a delicious lunch with his family.

Through his own initiative and with support from his wife, Jorge works in construction.  He works as a master builder.  He can work approximately 12 hours daily.  Thanks to his talent and skills Jorge has good customers.  He can tend to up to 5 customers monthly who always request construction jobs from him.

Jorge is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to buy lumber to be used in the construction jobs he does.  He will also be able to buy tools like hammers, buckets and trowels, among others.  In this way, Jorge will be able to increase his income and with it generate better wellbeing for his family insuring his children’s education since his great dream is to see his children become good professionals and upstanding citizens.

loans.use: to buy wood and building supplies.

loans.name: Erika Mariuxi

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal 4 De Noviembre.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Erika, tiene 24 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  8, 6 y 4 años de edad, los dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su esposo se dedica al comercio.

Nuestra amiga para ayudar a su esposo y con esto poder contribuir en algo al negocio de él, realiza el crédito para que el invierta en su negocio, el se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres, nos cuenta ella que su esposo  tiene un puesto en el Mercado de Manta, allí el trabaja todos los días desde las 05h00 hasta las 14h00 o hasta que haya vendido lo que llevo, para abastecerse de los productos se desplaza al mercado de mayoristas donde compra lo que necesita para la venta diaria, lleva más de 5 años con este negocio el cual les permite salir adelante. 

Este crédito es para comprar legumbres, frutas y verduras. Este es su tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es tener un carro para que su esposo vaya a realizar su negocio.
texts.en:
The members of the November 4th Communal Bank meet every 15 days in the lowlands of Montecristi, a city that is known for a large diversity of traditional products such as the Panama hats that are famous both within and outside of the country.

It is in this place that one can meet Sra. Erika. She is 24 years old, married, and has three children (ages 8, 6, and 4). The two older children are in school. Her husband works in his own business.

In order to help her husband and to contribute something to his business, Erika is taking out a loan to invest in his venture. She says that her husband has a stand at the market in Manta where he works every day from 5am to 2pm or until he sells all of his inventory. In order to restock with products, her husband travels to the wholesale market to buy what he needs on a daily basis. He has been in this business for more than five years and has been able to get ahead.

This loan will be used to buy fruits, legumes, and vegetables. Erika is participating in her third loan cycle with the Communal Bank. She enjoys being a member because of the help the loans have given her. Her dream is to have a car so that her husband can travel to his business.

loans.use: to buy fruits, legumes, and vegetables.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is a 67-year-old married woman living on the south coast of Kenya. She has four adult children. 

Despite her advanced age, Mwanasiti is a very industrious entrepreneur who does not fear any risks. She earns a living running a café, which she has done for two years. 

Mwanasiti would like to take a loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of ingredients so as to offer a variety of foods in her café. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and increase the turnover of her stock. 

She also hopes that through the loan, her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and enable her to set aside some savings. Her dream is to open a restaurant in the future.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients (wheat flour, rice, cooking oil) for her café.

loans.name: Laiki John

texts.en:
Laiki John, a 33- year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba, is married and has three children between the ages of five and nine, all of whom go to school. She has been operating a food store for two years. Her major challenges include high prices in the market.

Laiki heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and is now requesting a loan of 2000sdg to purchase tomatoes, onions, tomatoes, etc. Within five years, she would like to open many branches to expand her business. Laiki says she is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy items like tomatoes, onions, cabbages etc.

loans.name: María Martha

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal 4 De Noviembre.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen siete hijos todos mayores de edad, tres de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo trabaja ocasionalmente.

Nuestra amiga con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante ya que su esposo no tiene un trabajo fijo se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde tiene un pequeño local, Trabaja todos los días ya que así como sale también vende en su casa, su esposo le ayuda en días que él puede sobre todo cuando tiene que ir a cobrar ya que deja a crédito y  cobra cada ocho días. Tiene más de 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 4 años  y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó su negocio. 

Sus sueños es seguir tanto en el banco como mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
The members of the November 4th Communal Bank meet every 15 days in the lowlands of Montecristi, a city that is known for a large diversity of traditional products such as the Panama hats that are famous both within and outside of the country.

It is in this place that one can meet Sra. María. She is 52 years old, married, and has seven grown children. Three of them still live with her. Her husband works occasionally.

María intends to earn her own income and use the money to get ahead since her husband does not have a steady job. She sells clothing of all types and conducts her business by going door-to-door. María also sells from her home. Her husband helps out on the days when he is able, especially whenever she has to go out and collect payments. María extends credit and collects every eight days. She has been in this business for more than four years and has done very well.

This loan will be used to buy more merchandise such as trousers, blouses, T-shirts, and children’s clothing. She has been with the Communal Bank for four years and enjoys being a member because her first loan was used to start her business. Her dreams include continuing with her Communal Bank and improving her business.

loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, T-shirts, and children’s clothing.

loans.name: Fidel Antonio

texts.es:
Fidel, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poderlo invertir de un pedido de mercadería, que contiene productos de primera necesidad y granos básicos como el maíz, arroz, frijoles, café, aceite, entre otros que son necesarios y que puede estar incluidas en el pedido que ha realizado, este préstamo le dará los recursos económicos para que Fidel pueda aumentar su mercadería.
El préstamo anterior le permitió crecer en el negocio, dando de los recursos necesarios para invertirlo en la mercadería que es más demandada, con esto ha permitido una mejor solvencia económica junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Fidel is requesting a new loan in order to invest it in a merchandise order that contains basic household products and staple grains such as corn and rice, as well as beans, coffee, cooking oil and other necessities. These are products that can be included in the order he has undertaken. 

This loan will give Fidel the financial resources so that he can add to his merchandise.

The previous loan allowed him to achieve growth in his business, investing the necessary resources in the merchandise that is in most demand. This allowed him and his family to improve their financial circumstances.

loans.use: To buy corn, rice, beans, coffee and cooking oil.

loans.name: Gulnoza

texts.en:
Gulnoza is a woman who likes to work very hard. For more than two years she has been busy with sewing national dresses. She has “golden hands” and sews very beautiful dresses. Her mother helps her with the business. 

Gulnoza has many customers and serves them in her own workshop. All her clients are glad from her work. 

Gulnoza is not married and lives with her parents. She wants to develop her business but her income isn’t enough for it. She is asking for a loan to buy a sewing machine to develop her business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 22-year-old married lady from Gaza.

She owns a clothing shop that sells baby clothes.

She asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy an air conditioner, some shelves, goods, and clothes.

She hopes to develop her project and increase the income of her family.

The person who appears in the picture is Iman's husband.

loans.use: To buy an air conditioner, some shelves, goods, and clothes

loans.name: Leydi Yamileth

texts.es:
Leydi, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo con la intención de mejorar el negocio invirtiendolo de verduras frescas como lo son tomates, repollos, yuca, papas, para preparar los antojitos, siendo estas las más demandadas por sus clientes, este crédito le ayudará para continuar trabajando y ofreciendo a sus clientes verdura fresca.

El prestamo anterior le ha permitido mantenerse en el negocio, cubriendo la demanda de los clientes a través de una buena inversión con los recursos que se le prestaron,manifiesta que ha crecido y esto le ha generado una mejor condición más solvente para su familia.
texts.en:
Leydi is requesting a new loan with the intention of improving her business. She'll invest it in fresh vegetables such as tomatoes, cabbage, yucca and potatoes, in order to make antojitos (a typical snack), which are in high demand from her customers. This loan will help her to keep working and offering her customers fresh vegetables.
The previous loan allowed her to keep the business afloat by meeting her customers' orders, through the good investment she made with the funding she received. She reports that the business has grown and this resulted in an improved financial condition for her family.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes, cabbage, yucca and potatoes.

loans.name: Zaide Isabel

texts.es: La Sra. Zaide tiene 41 años tiene 2 hijos que son de las edades de 10, y 7 años,  ella se dedica  a la  venta y  crianza de cerdos en la localidad de Rio Seco, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Zaide va a usar este préstamo para la compra de cerdos para su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital para la compra de cerdos, la Sra. Zaide enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su calidad de vida y  va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar la calidad en la alimentación de sus cerdos,  su deseo es poder tener una granja donde pueda criar cantidad de cerdos para que de esta manera pueda mejorar su estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Zaide is 41 years old and has two children aged 10 and 7. She raises and sells pigs in the village of Rio Seco. This loan is her first one with the institution. Zaide will use this loan to purchase pigs for her business. The reason why she requests this loan is the lack of working capital for buying pigs. Zaide faces challenges in her business, such as improving her living conditions. She will use the profits to improve the quality of the feed she gives her pigs. Her wish is to be able to own a farm where she can raise a large quantity of pigs, so that she can improve her financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Deysin Yolanda

texts.es:
Deysin tiene 31 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 2 hijos y vive en un barrio del Centro de la Ciudad de San Pedro Sula.
Deysin tiene un negocio de venta de mercadería como ropa de dama, caballeros y niños, cargadores de celular y gorras. Este negocio lo tiene desde hace 15 años en un puesto del mercado local y lo inicio con el propósito de trabajar y tener ingresos como poder mantener sus hijos,  el negocio es rentable y trabaja desde muy temprano para atender a los clientes.
Solicito un préstamo de 5,000 lempiras para invertir en la compra de más mercadería como ropa de diferente variedad y gorras. Para aprovechar vender y obtener mejores resultados.
Su meta es poder ampliar su negocio mantenerlo siempre estable ya que es la fuente de ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Deysin, age 31, is a single mother with two children. She lives in a central neighborhood in the city of San Pedro Sula.

Deysin has a business of selling merchandise such as clothing (for women, men, and children), mobile phone chargers, and caps. For the past 15 years, she has managed her business from a stall at the local market. She started this business so that she could work and earn income to support her children. Her business is profitable and she begins her work very early so that she can attend to her customers.

Deysin is requesting a loan of 5,000 HNL in order to invest in the purchase of more merchandise, such as a wide variety of clothing and caps, to sell so that she can obtain better results. Her goal is to expand her business and to keep it stable since it serves as the source of income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of clothing and caps.

loans.name: Yudith

texts.es: La Sra. Yudith tiene 41 años tiene 2 hijos que son de las edades de 3, y 5 años,  ella se dedica  a la  venta y  crianza de cerdos en la localidad de Rio Seco, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Yudith va a usar este préstamo para la compra de cerdos para su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital para la compra de cerdos, la Sra. Yudith enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su calidad de vida y  va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar la calidad en la alimentación de sus cerdos,  su deseo es poder tener una granja donde pueda criar cantidad de cerdos para que de esta manera pueda mejorar su estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Yudith is 41 years old and has 2 children who are ages 3 and 5 years.  She sells and raises pigs in the town of Rio Seco.  This loan is her first cycle with the institution.  Yudith will use this loan to buy pigs for her business, her reason for requesting this loan is the lack of capital to purchase them.  

Yudith faces challenges in her business such as improving the quality of life for the pigs.  She will use the profits to improve the quality of food for her pigs, her desire is to have a farm where she can breed more pigs so that she can improve her economic stability.

loans.use: to buy pigs for her business.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is a hardworking 30-year-old business gentleman. He sells bread at retail, a business he has been doing for the last three years. 

He had previously acquired a loan from Yehu that helped him to grow his business. He understands how to manage his business because he has been trained in business management. He needs a loan of 50,000 KES to add stock of bread for sale.

Mohamed is divorced and without any child, but he tells us that he plans to marry another wife very soon. He therefore hopes to have a family. He dreams of expanding his business and opening a bakery in the future.

loans.use: to add stock of bread for sale.

loans.name: Bernard Gitimu

texts.en: Bernard is applying for his fourth loan from KADET LTD. after repaying the previous loan successfully. Bernard will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and start large-scale farming.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and fungicides.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a mother of six lovely children, five of whom are adults while one is still in school. She is from Msambweni on the southern Coast of Kenya. 

She has a dairy farm where she sells milk at retail from her home. Mwanamisi is a determined woman who is dedicated to making a healthy living for her family. With the support of her husband, who is a driver, she has made sure that her children acquire a good education. Mwanamisi needs this loan to purchase a dairy cow so as to increase her milk supplies.

She is dedicated to her business’ success. She dreams of expanding her business, thus ensuring a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen, a 57-year-old married father of two, has been operating a photo studio and selling newspapers for 17 years, earning a monthly income of 14,000 shillings. This will be his first loan with KADET LTD which he will add to his savings to build a house in Githurai.

loans.use: to add to his savings to build a house in Githurai.

loans.name: Victoria Bertha

texts.es:
La socia Victoria nació en la ciudad de Lima pero actualmente vive en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 37 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal de la socia Victoria es brindar servicio de hospedaje, ella recibe en su casa a jóvenes extranjeros que desean relacionarse con personas de diferentes culturas. Los jóvenes extranjeros viven con estas familias por un determinado tiempo en sus casas. En esta oportunidad la socia Victoria requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de la casa y desea construir un baño.  

La socia Victoria pertenece al banco comunal “Unión Latina” y le va muy bien pues una persona responsable y puntual.
texts.en:
The borrower, Victoria, was born in the city of Lima, but currently lives in the city of Cusco. She is 37, in a common-law relationship, and has two children. 

Victoria's main economic activity is providing lodging. She welcomes into her house young foreigners who wish to meet people of different cultures. The young foreigners live with these families in their homes for a certain period of time. 

On this occasion Victoria needs the loan to do maintenance work on the house, and she also wishes to construct a bathroom.  

Victoria belongs to the “Unión Latina” communal bank, and it is going well, as she is a responsible and punctual person.

loans.use: To do maintenance on her home and construct a bathroom.

loans.name: Candelaria De Suyapa

texts.es:
La Señora Candelaria, tiene 45 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 2 hijos, reside en el Municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa, Cortes.
Doña Candelaria inicio su negocio desde hace 6 años con fondos propios  y  debido a la necesidad de ayudar a su esposo aportando un ingreso extra al hogar. Las prendas que ella vende son ropa para damas, y ropa en general como (blusas, pantalones cortos, faldas, pantalones etc.). 
Ella ha solicitado consecutivamente varios préstamos con ODEF, los cuales le han ayudado mucho en la inversión a su negocio, del cual ha obtenido buenas ganancias. En la actualidad pide otro préstamo de 6000  lempiras para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de ropa para damas, blusas, pantalones cortos, etc.
Doña Candelaria esta motivada a seguir adelante con su negocio ya que su patrimonio ha crecido,
texts.en:
Sra. Candelaria is 45 years old, married, and has two children. She resides in the town of Santa Cruz de Yojoa, Cortes.

Doña Candelaria started her business six years ago using her own funds because she needed to help her husband with generating extra household income. The clothing she sells includes women’s outfits and general articles such as blouses, cut-off pants, skirts, trousers, and other items.

Candelaria has requested several loans consecutively from ODEF and they have been a great help with investing in her business so that she can generate better earnings. At the moment, she is requesting another loan in the amount of 6,000 HNL so that can continue investing in the purchase of women’s clothing, blouses, cut-off pants, and other items. Doña Candelaria is motivated to continue forward with her business so that she can grow her assets.

loans.use: to buy blouses, cut-off pants, skirts, trousers, and other items.

loans.name: Hafiza

texts.ru:
Хафиза родилась 1969 году в Вахдате. Она живет вместе с мужем. Хафиза занимается торговлей. Она во дворе дома открыла торговую точку. 
Хафиза занимается торговлей продуктов питания и хозяйственных товаров. Этим видом деятельности она занимается четыре года. 
Хафиза берет кредит для покупки продуктов, хозяйственных товаров, игрушек и приобретения холодильника.
texts.en: Hafiza was born in 1969 in the town of Vahdat. She lives together with her husband. Hafiza is in sales. She has opened a vendor location near her home and sells food and household products. She has been in this business for four years. Hafiza is taking out the loan to buy food, household products, toys and a refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy food, household products, toys and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Maka

texts.en:
Maka is 32 years old. She is married and lives in the Abasha district with her family: her husband (Zaza), mother-in-law, and two children (who are 8 and 9 years old). Both of the children go to a local school. Her mother-in-law is a pensioner. Maka and Zaza are busy with cattle breeding. They have 12 cows. They milk their cows twice a day and produce cheese. They sell their cheese on the local open market. They also have pigs and sell piglets in a nearby village. In addition to the cattle, they are busy with farming. The own a plot of land where maize, tomatoes, greens, and nuts are grown. They sell the harvested products at the local open market. 

Maka has requested a loan for purchasing fertilizers. Maka and Zaza will cultivate and fertilize the land. After this is properly done, they hope to get a larger and better quality harvest. They will sell the harvested products for a good price. After the harvest, they will mow off the land. This will enable them to decrease their dairy costs, as they will make hay from the mowed grass to feed their cattle instead of buying it at a high price. This will increase the family's income. With the increased income, they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
Nuestra socia  es la señora María Teresa, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mujeres Emprendedoras” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú, nuestra socia se sigue dedicando a la compra y venta de ropa, la cual comercia en una de las ferias más populares de la ciudad, María Teresa invertirá el préstamo solicitado para comprar más mercadería como pantalones, cascas y camisas.
María Teresa está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle seguir con su comercio y por apoyarla con su familia.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
María Teresa is one of our customers: she is a member of “Mujeres Emprendedoras” (Enterprising Women), a Communal Banks of the town of Cusco, Peru. She keeps on buying clothes that she then sells in one of the most popular fairs in her town. María Teresa will invest the loan she is requesting in the purchase of products such as trousers, zip jackets and shirts.
María Teresa is deeply grateful to KIVA for allowing her to carry on with her activity and for helping her supporting her family.
She is thankful for the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues according to her repayment schedule.

loans.use: To buy trousers, zip jackets and shirts.

loans.name: Maria Emperatriz

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de zapatos,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria ofreciendo a lugares como instituciones y publico en general,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia es una persona muy empoñosa y quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los zapatos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar zapatos al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria is continuing in her business of selling shoes.  She sells her merchandise in a variety of locations.  She works from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm.  She is a very hardworking person and wishes to make economic progress.  Her dream is to have a permanent location where she can sell her shoes. 

She is seeking this loan so that she can buy shoes at wholesale prices.  She is grateful for this opportunity and promises to make her repayments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy shoes at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poderlo invertir en el negocio, comprándose una cantidad de pollos  pequeños y concentrado para alimentarlos, esto le permitirá crecer en su granja y tener las condiciones necesarias para poder continuar en la crianza de pollos.

El manifiesta que el préstamo anterior le permitió crecer y tener lo necesario para trabajar, sus circunstancias familiares están mejorando, pues considera recibir mejores ingresos los cuales le permiten crear una condición más estable.
texts.en:
Miguel is seeking a new loan so that he can invest in his business.  He plans to buy a number of chicks as well as chicken feed so that he can raise the birds.  This will allow him to expand his operations and to continue raising chickens.

He reports that the previous loan enabled him to obtain everything he needed to grow his business.  His family's circumstances are improving, since his increased income has allowed him to create more stable conditions.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed.

loans.name: Anuwar

texts.en:
Anuwar is 61 years old.  He lives in a small village in Msambweni District with his family - his wife and six children.  He runs a kiosk, a business he has been running for the last 8 years.  He previously worked as a fish monger for several years. 
Anuwar requested a loan of Ksh 15,000 to clear an outstanding balance of school fees for his son who is 18 years old.  He dreams of opening a shop in future.  With increased profits, he will be able to reinvest in the business in order to expand it and make it more profitable, meaning that the living conditions of the family will be improved.  Thanks for the support Yehu and Kiva are giving him.

loans.use: to pay for school fees

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es:
Dionicio, tiene 45 años de edad, vive en unión libre, tiene 2 hijos  y vive en el Municipio de Tulabe, Comayagua.
El ha sido agricultor de toda su vida, cultiva café, hace 6 años aproximadamente que realiza esta actividad que le genera ingresos propios. Ha logrado en su vida darle a su familia lo necesario para vivir.  A esta actividad le dedica 8 horas diarias.
 Esta solicitando un préstamo de 5,000.00 para darle un buen mantenimiento al cultivo de café comprando fertilizante,  y sacar una buena cosecha. 
Su meta es incrementar la producción para lograr un nivel de vida mejor.
texts.en: Dionicio, 45, lives in a common law relationship; he has two children and lives in the municipality of Tulabe, Comayagua.  He’s been a farmer his entire life; he has been growing coffee for the last six years and it generates his own income.  He’s managed in life to give his family what’s necessary to life.  He spends 8 hours at work daily.  He’s asking for a 5,000 loan for coffee crop maintenance; he will buy fertilizer to produce a good harvest.  His goal is to increase production to attain a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Emigdio De Jesus

texts.es:
Emigdio, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo considera que se motivó porque ha recibido una buena atención y al mismo tiempo estos créditos le han ayudado a mejorar el negocio, en esta ocasión se comprara cerdos para la granja, los cuales estarán en el proceso de engorde para luego poderlos comercializar, su dinámica en el negocio es la compra de los cerdos pequeños engordarlos, crecerlos y ponerlos a la venta para poder obtener un margen de ganancia.
El préstamo anterior le permitió mejorar el negocio y tener lo necesario para continuar trabajando, hasta el momento sus condiciones económicas y familiares se han mantenido estables.
texts.en:
Emigdio is seeking a new loan.  His business has received positive attention, and these loans have helped him to improve his business.  With this loan he plans to purchase pigs for his farm, which he will fatten so that he can resell them.  His business strategy is to buy small pigs and fatten them, then put them up for sale so that he can make a profit.

With his previous loan he was able to make improvements to his business and have everything he needed in order to continue his operations.  Recently his economic and family conditions have remained stable.

loans.use: to buy pigs for his farm.

loans.name: Brigida Candida

texts.es:
Doña Brígida tiene 44 años de edad, vive en unión libre,  tiene 2 hijos , vive en el municipio de Victoria Yoro.
 Doña Brígida tiene un negocio de venta de ropa nueva. Ella inicio su negocio desde hace 3 años con fondos propios, con el propósito de ayudar a su esposo aportando un ingreso extra al hogar. Las prendas que ella vende son ropa interior para damas, ropa en general como (blusas, pantalones cortos, faldas, pantalones etc.), zapatos y utensilios para el hogar como Ollas, lavamanos etc.  Ella ha obtenidos varios prestamos con ODEF, los cuales le han ayudado mucho en la inversión a su negocio, del cual ha obtenido buenas ganancias. 
En la actualidad pide un cuarto préstamo de 20,500 lempiras para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de ropa interior para damas, blusas, pantalones, vestidos y sandalias. Con esta inversión piensa mejorar sus ingresos y crecer más.
Su plan es ahorrar para poder brindarles una mejor vida a sus hijos
texts.en:
Brígida, 44, is in a common law relationship; she has two children and lives in the Municipality of Victoria, Yoro.

Brígida has a business selling new clothes.  She started it three years ago with her own funds with the goal in mind of helping her husband by producing extra household income.  The clothes she sells are women’s underwear and clothing in general like blouses, short pants, skirts, pants, etc., shoes and household items like pots, hand towels, etc.  She’s gotten several ODEF loans that have helped her quite a bit to invest in her business which has led to her obtaining good profits.

She’s currently requesting her 4th ODEF loan fir 20,500 lempiras to continue buying women’s underwear, blouses, pants, dresses and sandals.  With this investment she intends to improve her income and to grow even more.  Her plan is to save in order to provide a better life for her children.

loans.use: to buy clothes and sandals.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es:
El socio Abraham nació en el departamento del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 32 años de edad,  es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos. Su actividad económica de Abraham es la venta de dólares de forma ambulatoria. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad el socio Abraham requiere el préstamo para el mantenimiento de la casa por lo tanto va comprar mayólica. 

El socio Abraham pertenece al banco comunal “Unión Latina” y le va muy bien pues una persona responsable y puntual.
texts.en: Abraham was born in the department of Cusco and still lives in the city of his birth.  He’s 32-years-old, married and has three children.  Abraham’s economic activity is selling dollars from place to place.  He’s been in this business for several years now and does very well.  On this occasion, Abraham needs the loan for home improvements.  He will buy tile.  Abraham belongs to the “Unión Latina” (Latin Unity) communal bank and does well because he’s a responsible, punctual person.

loans.use: to buy tile.

loans.name: Shalom Isabel

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de de venta de productos de belleza,la socia vende perfumes,cremas y lapiz labiales,la socia tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de cereales como quinua,trigo y cebada y luego lo distribuye a diferentes tiendas de abarrotes,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los productos de belleza.La socia solicita el credito para comprar lapiz labiales,perfumes y cremas y tambien para comprar cereales como trigo,cebada y quinua.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: She continues selling beauty products like perfume, cream and lipstick and she also continues selling grains like quinoa, wheat and barley to various grocery stores.  She is able to support her children by means of these businesses.  Her dream is to have a permanent locale from which to sell the beauty products.  She’s asking for a loan to buy lipstick, perfume and creams and also to buy cereals like wheat, barley and quinoa.  She’s happy about the loan and committed to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and grains.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Marlen Elizabeth

texts.es:
Marlen tiene 26 años de edad, es casada, tiene 1 hijo, vive  en el Municipio de Victoria, Yoro. 
Ella  es muy trabajadora, vende su mercadería de forma ambulante,   vende mercadería como ropa para damas, ropa de niño, calzado, ropa interior para damas y caballeros y ropa de cama.  Trabaja las 8 horas del día, todos los días. Este negocio lo estableció hace 3 años, con el fin de generar más ingresos al hogar y ayudar a su esposo  cubrir algunos gastos.
En la actualidad solicita un cuarto préstamo de 20,500  lempiras para compra de más mercadería como pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisas, ropa interior, etc. Para tener variedad de producto que ofrecer a los clientes.
Su sueño es llegar a tener un local fijo donde vender de todos los productos que necesiten los clientes y así poder mejorar su nivel de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Marlen, 26, is married and has a son.  She lives in the Municipality of Victoria, Yoro.  She’s very hardworking.  She sells her merchandise from place to place.  She sells merchandise like women’s and children’s clothes, shoes, women’s and men’s underwear and bed linens.  She works 8 hours a day every day.  She started the business three years ago aiming to generate more household income and help her husband cover some of the expenses.

She’s currently asking for her 4th loan for 20,500 lempiras to buy more merchandise like pants, skirts, blouses, shirts, underwear, etc. in order to have variety of goods on hand to offer her customers.  Her dream is to have a permanent sales site someday to sell all the products her customers need and thus improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Juana tiene 39 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo, vive en un barrio del centro de la Ciudad de San Pedro Sula.
Doña Juana tiene 14 años de haber establecido un negocio de venta de mercadería como ropa, zapatos, tenis, y sandalias. ella vende en un puesto del mercado local en el cual ya es muy conocida,  además cuenta con sus propios clientes. Doña Juana esta muy motivada porque su negocio hasta el momento le ha sido rentable con las ayuda de los financiamientos que anteriormente a solicitado los cuales los ha sabido invertir bien en su negocio.
Actualmente esta solicitando un próximo préstamo de 15,000 lempiras para invertir en compra alguna mercadería  como Ropa para niño, adulto y también calzado, espera que con esta inversión dará mejor servicio al gusto de los clientes y obtenga mejores ganancias.
Su plan es seguir manteniendo su negocio bien surtido y poder sacar su familia delante.
texts.en:
Juana is 39 years old and a single mother with one child. She lives in a central neighborhood in the city of San Pedro Sula.

Fourteen years ago, Doña Juana established her business of selling merchandise such as clothing, shoes, sneakers, and sandals. She sells from a stall at the local market and has already become well-known. In addition, she has her own customers. Doña Juana is very excited because her business has been profitable to this point as a result of the loans she previously requested. She knows how to invest very well in her business.

At the moment, Juana is requesting her next loan in the amount of 15,000 HNL so that she can invest in the purchase of merchandise such as clothing for children and adults, as well as shoes. She hopes this investment will result in better service to the liking of her customers and also generate more earnings. Her plan is to keep her business well-stocked so that her family can stay ahead.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Habiba

texts.en:
Habiba is 25 years old and lives in the town of Msambweni in the South Coast region of Kenya. She is married and has two children, both currently in school. 

For the past five years, Habiba has been working hard to manage her hardware business, which sells a variety of items at retail and wholesale. She says that she cooperates with her husband, who is a driver.

To help expand her business, Habiba has requested a loan of 50,000 Kenyan shillings from Yehu. The loan will be used to buy more stock of items for resale and will help her to generate greater profits and increase her capital stock. 

Habiba hopes that in the future she will be able to hire some employees. For now, her husband assists her during his free time. Thanks for her efforts.

loans.use: to buy more stock of items for resale.

loans.name: Bilal

texts.en:
Bilal is 22 years old and lives in Beit Lahia, Gaza.

He has owned a grocery store for two years and has one employee.	

He asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy refrigerators and shelves, and to change the decoration of the store.

He hopes that he will improve his income and approach his ambition, which is to develop his grocery store and have a family that will be proud of him.

loans.use: to buy refrigerators and shelves, and to change the decoration of the store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to stock up on merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece  al banco comunal VIRGEN DEL CARMEN; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Wanchaq en la provincia  de Cusco departamento de Cusco.

La socia Lucia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche, golosinas, gaseosas entre otros, la socia trabaja desde las 09:00am hasta las 05:00pm aproximadamente en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño quien le pone cada día, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como gaseosas para su negocio.

Los otros socios se dedican a la venta de comida, compra y venta de fruta, tienda de abarrotes, guardianía, trabajador de una empresa privada.

La persona que sale adjunto en la foto pidió permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión.

La socia agradece este medio por el cual le facilita el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Lucia is a member off the “Virgen del Carmen” communal bank located in Wanchaq District in Cusco Province and Department.  She alternates her daily chores with a business selling basic staple items like rice, sugar, milk, snacks and soft-drinks, among others.  She works from 9am until 5pm approximately in one of the city of Cusco’s markets.  She’s been in this business for some time now and does well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day; this is the way she supports her family.  She’s requesting a loan to buy merchandise like soft-drinks for her business.

The other group members sell food, are fruit merchants, run grocery stores, and are caretakers and employees of private firms.

The person who appears in the inserted photo asked permission to be late to the meeting.

Lucia uses this means to thank those who fund her loan and commits to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Benito

texts.es: El Sr. Benito  tiene 28 años y tiene 3 hijos que son de las edades de  5, 8 y 10 años, el se dedica a la construcción es albañil contratista, realiza trabajos en las localidades y en la ciudad de Santa Cruz, el vive en la localidad de Puerto Rico,  este préstamo es su primer crédito dentro de la institución, el Sr. Benito va a usar este préstamo para la compra de calaminas para el techado de su vivienda,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de dinero para la compra de material de construcción, el Sr. Benito enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencia del clima que no permite realizar su trabajo, el Sr. Benito se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que este préstamo le permite brindar mayor comodidad a su familia y de esta manera  mejorar su calidad de vida y la  de su familia.
texts.en:
Benito, 28, has three children who are 5, 8 and 10 years of age.  He works in construction as a hired bricklayer.  He does jobs locally and in the city of Santa Cruz.  He lives in the locality of Puerto Rico.  This loan is his first with the institution.

Benito will use the loan to buy metal sheeting for his roof.  The reason for requesting the loan is that he lacks money to buy building supplies.  The business challenge Benito faces is weather conditions that keep him from being able to do his work.

Benito feels happy and grateful for the opportunity he’s being given since this loan will allow him to provide more comfort for his family thus improving his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheets of zinc so that he can replace the roof over his living room.

loans.name: Cesar Anibal

texts.es:
Cesar es un hombre de 47 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposa y sus 4 hijos, él es un hombre muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos familiares no pudo cursar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Educación: en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con sus hijos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, día a día Cesar trabaja como chofer de su propia mototaxi, el labora un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y puede atender a un promedio de 40 clientes, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que marcha bien debido a su buen servicio y trato amable.
Cesar se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el tarrajeado y pintado de su vivienda, así también podrá comprar un juego de llantas para su mototaxi; de esta manera Cesar contará con su vehículo en mejores condiciones, el cual le genere más ingresos económicos, los cuales desea utilizar para asegurar la educación de sus hijos; asimismo, podrá brindar un ambiente más seguro, adecuado y cómodo para su familia, ya que en la época de invierno las temperaturas son muy bajas; así Cesar espera poder cumplir su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Cesar is a 47-year-old man who lives in the city of Ica with his wife and four children.  He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic man, and dedicates all of his efforts to providing a better life for his family.  Regrettably, due to the necessity of working and paying for his household expenses, he was not able to pursue a professional career, but he would have liked to have been able to study education.  In his spare time he likes to play with his children, and sometimes he makes a delicious rice and chicken dish to share with his family.

With much effort and enthusiasm, day after day Cesar works as a chauffeur using his own mototaxi.  He works approximately 10 hours each day and can serve an average of 40 clients per day.  He enjoys his work and believes it is going well thanks to his good service and friendly treatment of his customers.

Cesar is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he will be able to seal the brick walls in his home in preparation for painting, and he will also be able to buy a pair of tires for his mototaxi.  In this way, he will have his vehicle in top condition, which will allow him to increase his income, which he will use to assure that his children have an education.  Likewise, he will be able to provide a more secure and comfortable environment for his family, since in the winter the temperatures are very low.  He hopes to be able to realize his dream of seeing his children grow up to be good and responsible adults with professional careers.

loans.use: to purchase a pair of tires for his mototaxi and to seal the brick walls in his home so they can be painted.

loans.name: Rosa Isabel

texts.es:
Rosa, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, por la necesidad de invertir más en el negocio, se comprara productos naturales como aloe vera, omega tres, linaza, vitaminas, ya que son de origen natural, para poder continuar ofreciendo a sus clientes, pues son muy demandados por su efectividad para diferestes enfermedades.

Ella manifiesta que con estos créditos está logrando mejorar la disponibilidad  e incrementar sus inventarios, con esto también le permite mejorar sus ingresos y ofrecer una mejor situación económica a su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
Rosa has decided on a new loan because she needs to invest more in her business.  She will buy natural products like aloe vera, omega-3, flax and vitamins that are natural to continue offering to her customers because they are in high demand because of their efficacy in various illnesses.  

She states that with these loans she’s improving availability and increasing her inventory which leads to improved income and to being able to offer her family a better economic situation.

loans.use: to buy aloe vera, omega-3, flax and vitamins.

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es:
Roberto, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para continuar invirtiendo el negocio, comprará varias cargas de leña para salir a vender, esto le ayudará a Roberto para continuar en esta temporada de invierno proveyendo a la gente la leña seca para que puedan cocinar.

Esto le permite a él crecer y tener lo necesario para continuar trabajando, con el préstamo anterior mantuvo las condiciones adecuadas en el negocio, teniendo mejores ingresos y viviendo en una mejor condición.
texts.en: Roberto is requesting a new loan to continue investing in the business.  He will buy several loads of firewood to sell.  This will help Roberto to continue during the winter providing firewood to people so they can cook.  This allows him to grow and to have what he needs to continue working.  With the previous loan he maintained adequate business conditions improving income and living in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy firewood to resell.

loans.name: Dorjsuren

texts.en:
Dorjsuren, 24, lives with his wife and his two children in their own small house in Tosontsengel, Mongolia.  His wife works at a bank. His children are kindergarten students. 

Dorjsuren started his livestock raw material business with his brother in 2006. He also opened his grocery store due to the business profit in 2011. Now his business is sustainable and has many regular customers and suppliers. 

He wants to expand his business. He would like to buy a car for his business as he needs to carry products. The price of the car is 6,000,000 MNT. He has prepaid 3,900,000 MNT for the car. Now he is requesting 2,100,000 MNT to pay off the rest. 

Dorjsuren is a hardworking man. He said, "My business efficiency and profit is incurred by buying a car. My next goal is to open my own cafe and restaurant."

loans.use: to buy a car to carry products for his grocery store business.

loans.name: Vianey

texts.es: La  señora   Vianey  es una  persona  muy  trabajadora que  se  esfuerza  por  sacar  adelante a  su familia  ella   actualmente  se  dedica  a la venta  de  joyería  la  cual le   permite  obtener ingresos, se acerco a la  institución  ya  que  desea  realizar  la compra  de mercancía   ya que  se  preocupa  por  brindarles a  sus  clientes  un excelente servicio, ve  en  el  crédito la posibilidad de  hacer   crecer   su   negocio   generando  mayores  ingresos    y  brindándole la posibilidad  de  ofrecer  a sus  hijos  una  excelente estabilidad por lo que  se  encuentra  muy  contenta.
texts.en: Vianey is a very hardworking person who makes an effort to get her family ahead.  Currently she works selling jewelry, which allows her to have an income.  She approached the institution because she wants to buy merchandise, as she is concerned about giving her customers excellent service.  She sees the loan as a way of making her business grow, generating greater income, and having the possibility of offering her children excellent stability, for which she is very happy.

loans.use: to buy jewelry to sell.

loans.name: Dennis Miguel

texts.es: Dennis es un joven soltero de 24 años quien vive en la ciudad de Milagros. A su edad es un micro empresario ya que se dedica a la venta de ropa, sus inicios en este negocio se dieron por casualidad. Empezó ofreciendo pantalones a sus compañeros de trabajo los cuales compraba bajo pedido, de esto ya 2 años y va en aumento por lo que se siente satisfecho de lograr sus metas. El trabajo lo realiza solo todos los días sin horario establecido, algunas veces lo acompaña su enamorada. Con el crédito Dennis espera comprar mercadería como pantalones unisex, camisas, blusas. Su mayor reto es poner un negocio fijo para brindar un excelente servicio luego poder obtener su casa propia.
texts.en: Dennis is a young man of 24, he is single and he lives in the town of Milagros. At his young age he is already a micro entrepreneur engaging in selling clothes. He has started this activity by sheer chance, selling trousers to his colleagues and he worked to order. It has been 2 years since then, his activity is growing and he fells satisfied with having reached his goals. He works alone every day, he does not work fixed hours and at times his girlfriend goes with him. With the loan he is requesting Dennis hopes to buy products such as unisex trousers, shirts and blouses. His biggest challenges are to open a regular shop to provide and excellent service, and to have a house of his own in the future.

loans.use: To buy unisex trousers, shirts and blouses.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo pues inicia el nuevo cultivo de maíz de la temporada, se comprará el abono, herbicidas, que son necesarios para cultivar los granos básicos, el prestamo permitirá con los fondos de estado realizar una buena inversión que le ayude prevenir al cultivo de las plagas y cualquier otro daño que le puede llegar, que le fortalezcan la producción y aumente sus cosechas.

El préstamo anterior aumentó la producción de maíz para poder comercializarla, en la cual ha obtenido mejores ingresos para incurrir en las mejora en su hogar, su situación económica está mejorando a través  de su trabajo en agricultura y el crédito con KIVA.
texts.en:
Mario’s asking for a new loan because the new corn planting season is starting. He’ll buy manure and herbicide that’s needed to farm basic grains.  The loan added to state funds will allow him to make a good investment that will help him prevent infestations or any other kind of damage in his crops so that production will be strengthened and crop yields will increase.

The previous loan increased corn production to be sold and he earned better income that led to home improvements.  [PADECOMSM believes] that his economic situation is improving through his work in agriculture and his Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Carlos Jose

texts.es:
Don Carlos es de la concha comarca de Teustepe municipio de Boaco, casado, de oficio agricultor se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos maíz y frijol, padre de 3 hijos que están a su cargo, actualmente estudian en una escuela de la comunidad. Carlos empezó a trabajar en la siembra  desde los 19 años de edad con dinero que tenia ahorrado ya que desde pequeño  trabajo cuidando fincas que están cerca de su comunidad, el dinero que obtuvo de su trabajo lo invirtió en la siembra de granos básicos, hoy en día gracias a su arduo trabajo diario y esfuerzo propio ha logrado comprar sus animales (vacas), también ha logrado comprar mas tierras, su esposa lo apoya con el negocio ya que el además de sembrar maíz y frijol, vende cuajadas de la leche que producen sus vacas como otros ingresos, sus productos los comercializa en la misma comunidad para evitar gastos de transporte. 

Solicita el préstamo para comprar un toro reproductor y terneros, con el objetivo de incrementar su crianza de ganado de engorde para luego venderlos a un mejor precio, sus planes futuros es cancelar el crédito con la venta de sus ganados  y con las ganancias que le quede abrir una cuenta de ahorro para asegurar su futuro y el de la familia pues su deseo es llegar a ser alguien independiente económicamente.
texts.en:
Carlos is from La Concha in Teustepe District, Boaco Municipality.  He’s married and a farmer growing corn and beans.  He’s the father of three children who are in his care and are currently attending a local school.

Carlos started working in crops since he was 19-years-old with money he’d saved since he worked taking care of nearby farms since he was little.  He invested the money he earned from his work in planting basic grains.  Today, thanks to his hard daily work and his own efforts he’s managed to buy his animals (cows) and he’s also bought more land.  His wife helps him in the business since in addition to planting corn and beans he sells curd from the milk produced by his cows as a source of extra income.  He sells his products in his own community in order to save transportation costs.

He’s asking for the loan to buy a breeding bull and calves in order to increase his herd size for subsequent sale at better prices.  His future plan is to repay the loan with profits from his cattle sales and to use any remaining profits to open a savings account to insure his and his family’s future since he hopes to become a financially independent person someday.

loans.use: to buy a breeding bull and calves.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: EL SR. JUAN JOSE ESTA SOLICITANDO EL QUINTO  CREDITO PARA  COLOCAR UN BARANDAL  AL FRENTE DEL DOMICILIO Y TAMBIEN PARA RAELIZAR ALGUNOS TRABAJO S DE ENJARRE Y DETALLES DE CONSTRUCCION EL SR. JUAN Y SU ESPOSA YAZMIN SON CLIENTES DESDE AL AÑO 2005 ACTUALMENTE TIENE UN HIJO DEPENDIENTE QUE SE LLAMA JOSE DE 14 AÑOS Y EL PROYECTO ES PARA TENER UNA MEJOR CONDICION DE VIDA EL SR. JUAN TRABAJA EN UNA CONOCIDA FABRICA Y SU ESPOSA ACTUALMENTE ES DISTRIBUIDORA DE VALES DE CALZADO DE UNA CONOCIDA ZAPATARIA LOCAL.
texts.en: Mr. Juan Jose is seeking his fifth loan to construct a hand railing outside of his home, and also to complete some plaster work and small construction details. Juan and his wife Yazmin have been clients since 2005. They have a son, who is named Jose and is 14 years old. Juan works in an well-known factory, and his wife distributes vouchers and coupons for a well-known local shoe store. This project is to improve the family's quality of life.

loans.use: to build a hand railing

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
El Sr. Angel de 56 años de edad es comerciante y junto con su esposa se dedican a la venta de ropa, calzado y artículos de segunda mano. Tiene un hijo de 22 años al cual siguen apoyando económicamente y es la razón por la cual ellos luchan diariamente por salir adelante ya que el continua con sus estudios, quieren ser un ejemplo de superación para el y demostrar que con esfuerzo y responsabilidad siempre se puede salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades que haya en el camino. 
En esta ocasión Angel solicita de nuestra ayuda para reparar y dar mantenimiento a su vehículo el cual es una importante herramienta de trabajo ya que lo usa para llevar su mercancía a distintos puntos de la ciudad. Sin el se vería afectado en distintas maneras ya que generaría perdidas para su negocio.
texts.en:
Ángel, 56, is a merchant.  He and his wife sell clothes, shoes and second-hand items.  He has a 22-year-old son he still supports economically since he’s still pursuing his studies.  They want to set an example for him and show that with effort and responsibility they can always get ahead despite adversities that crop up along the way.

On this occasion Ángel is asking our help to repair and service his vehicle which is an important work tool since he uses it to transport his merchandise to various points in the city.  Without it he’d be affected in many ways since it would generate business losses.

loans.use: to repair and service his work vehicle.

loans.name: Luis Eugenio

texts.es:
El Sr. Luis Eugenio después de que sale de trabajar todos los días como una persona responsable por su pequeña familia que son solo él y su esposa la Sra. marcela, se propuso a abrir su propio de negocio de snack´s teniendo una variedad de productos para ofrecerle a sus clientes. lo mejor es que el señor Eugenio está ubicado en punto muy bueno en la ciudad por donde mucha gente transita así el puede darse a conocer y más que nada tener más ingresos. 
Eugenio trabaja en unas oficinas del gobierno eso lo ha hecho un hombre de bien y responsable, su negocio servirá para cubrir otros gastos para tener ingresos extra e invertir bien su tiempo.
el crédito lo ocupara para comprar mercancía y surtir mas su negocio.
texts.en:
When Luis Eugenio gets off work every day being a person who is responsible for his small family which consists of just him and his wife, Marcela, he opened a small business of his own selling snacks.  He has a variety of products to sell his customers.  The best thing is that Eugenio is located on a very good spot in the city where there are a lot of passersby so he can become well-known and earn more income.

Eugenio works in a government office which has made him become an upstanding, responsible citizen.  His business will help him cover expenses and to have extra income and to use his time well.

He will use the loan to buy merchandise to stock his business.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Chol Manon

texts.en:
Chol is a 42-year-old businessman who lives in Juba. He is married and has five children between the ages of 2 and 13. Three of them go to school. 

Chol runs a general store and has been in business for five years. He has no employees. He heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. 

He is taking a loan of 2,000 sdg to purchase sorghum, maize, and many other items. 

In addition to this business, he has no other source of income. In five years Chol would like to open a depot and expand his business.

His major challenges include high transportation costs.

Chol says he is happy about the loans given by Finance Sudan.

loans.use: to buy items like maize, sorghum, cassava, etc. for his general store.

loans.name: Mahoulome 3 Group

texts.fr: Le groupement MAHOULOME 3 est composé de quinze personnes qui résident dans le même village. La représentante de ce groupement, du nom de Juliette est celle ayant une main levée sur la photo. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupement sollicite pour une première fois l'appui financier de ALIDé. Juliette n’a jamais fréquenté l’école. Juliette est âgée de 45 ans et est mariée à un revendeur du nom de Jean. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Juliette et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants et assurent ensemble les diverses de la famille. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de sa famille, Juliette vend depuis huit ans, divers produits et de la farine de manioc dans sa région. Juliette s'approvisionne dans sa région et dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer leur activité et de mieux satisfaire leur clientèle, Juliette et les autres membres du groupement MAHOULOME 3 sollicitent un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé. Leur ambition est d’accroître le niveau de leur activité.
texts.en:
The group MAHOULOME 3 consists of fifteen members who all live in the same village. The group’s representative is Juliette, seen with her hand raised in the photo. To bolster their activities and better meet customer demand, the group is seeking financial assistance from ALIDé for the first time. 

Juliette, age 45, never attended school. She is married to a reseller named Jean. The couple have three dependent children, all in school. Juliette and her husband live with their children, and the couple handle the various household responsibilities together. To that end, Juliette has been selling various products and cassava flour locally for eight years. She buys her stock in the area and at a market in Benin. 

To strengthen their activities and better meet the needs of their customers, Juliette and the other members of MAHOULOME 3 are seeking a first loan from ALIDé. Their goal is to bolster their sales.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour.

loans.name: Francisco Arnoldo

texts.es:
Francisco, se dedica al transporte de pasajeros, este oficio lo adquirió gracias al apoyo de un hermano quien también está dedicado a la misma actividad, trabaja sin un horario establecido y hasta el momento cuenta con buena experiencia, el cliente vive con su familia, su esposa, sus hijos, solamente él trabaja para el sustento del hogar.

Actualmente necesita realizar la inversión en la compra de repuestos y lubricantes para su vehículo, éste vehículo es el que le permite realizar su trabajo diariamente por lo mismo es una necesidad, querer tenerlo en buenas condiciones para poderle ofrecer a sus clientes un viaje más seguro.

Su aspiración es tener éxito en su trabajo, ofrecer un buen servicio a los clientes, ya que esto le permitirá ofrecer a su familia los recursos necesarios para cubrir las necesidades.
texts.en:
Francisco transports passengers, an activity he started thanks to the support of one of his brothers who engages in same activity as well. He does not work fixed hours, and at present he can count on a good experience in the field. He lives with his family – his wife and their children – and he is the only one who works and supports the family.

He currently needs to buy spare parts and lubricants for his vehicle, as this is the mean he works with every there, thus being it necessary to keep it in good conditions in order to grant a safer journey to his customers.

He hopes to succeed in his job and to provide a good service to his customers, as this will allow him to provide his family with what they need to pay for their necessities.

loans.use: To buy spare parts and lubricants for his vehicle.

loans.name: Eddy

texts.es:
Eddy tiene 34 años. Vive en la casa que heredó de su suegra, desde hace 9 años, en la localidad de Yanamarca, conformó su familia junto a su esposo Raúl y sus cinco hijos.  
Mientras que su esposo se dedica al cuidado, administración y comercialización de sus sembríos de papa, quinua y cebada; ella se encarga de los animales, posee toros, ovejas y cerdos. Su trabajo consiste en la compra de estos animales cuando recién están pequeños o se encuentran desnutridos. Los que después de un tiempo de dedicación, cuidados y alimentación, crecen y recuperan su vitalidad, los comercializa en el mercado de la ciudad. Sus 8 años de experiencia en este trabajo le ayudaron para que cuente con buenos compradores, los que siempre llegan a su misma casa para ver si ya se encuentran maduros, “en lagunas oportunidades, ya dejan pagado por anticipación los animales”, comenta.

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Corazón de Jesús” y este es su quinto crédito con MFP.
